snippet.title: K-Razy Kritters for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

K-Razy Kritters is an action game, similar to Space Invaders.

Your goal is to clear the wave from the hostile "Alien Kritters", who are sealed in proton transportation capsules.

Occassionally an Alien Patrol Kritter will come up at the top of the screen. Destroying it will grant you a free base.


What I think:

Nice game, but taking down a wave feels so...long.
